html: Great news → The House passed the Tax Cuts 2.0 legislative package. These bills will make the tax cuts for families and individuals permanent, increase flexibility for retirement savings accounts, and expand the ability for entrepreneurs to access start-up funds.
text: Great news → The House passed the Tax Cuts 2.0 legislative package. These bills will make the tax cuts for families and individuals permanent, increase flexibility for retirement savings accounts, and expand the ability for entrepreneurs to access start-up funds.

html: After 3 days of the reckless #SchumerShutdown, I am glad that the Democrats have come to their senses and finally agreed to fund our military, veterans' programs, #CHIP and other critical operations. Now, we can re-open the government and get back to work for the American people.
text: After 3 days of the reckless #SchumerShutdown, I am glad that the Democrats have come to their senses and finally agreed to fund our military, veterans' programs, #CHIP and other critical operations. Now, we can re-open the government and get back to work for the American people.

html: Glad to see that @SenSchumer took my advice and chose to end this unnecessary shutdown. It was wrong of the Senate Democrats to hold our nation hostage, but I am pleased that we can now move forward with funding critical programs like #CHIP and our military.pic.twitter.com/jRT06S1NK6
text: Glad to see that @SenSchumer took my advice and chose to end this unnecessary shutdown. It was wrong of the Senate Democrats to hold our nation hostage, but I am pleased that we can now move forward with funding critical programs like #CHIP and our military.pic.twitter.com/jRT06S1NK6

html: If our troops don’t get paid during the #SchumerShutdown, I cannot in good conscious accept my pay. I requested that my personal salary be withheld until we fund the government. I will continue working toward a timely solution and will fight for the needs of West Tennesseans.pic.twitter.com/pDO2EODqC5
text: If our troops don’t get paid during the #SchumerShutdown, I cannot in good conscious accept my pay. I requested that my personal salary be withheld until we fund the government. I will continue working toward a timely solution and will fight for the needs of West Tennesseans.pic.twitter.com/pDO2EODqC5

html: Shameful that Democrats are putting politics over our national security. I voted for the CR because we must fund our military and #CHIP. I voted to keep the government open because West Tennesseans sent me to Washington to solve problems, and I will continue to do just that.
